What is Aren Desai's academic background: [arendesai.com/portfolio] He holds a BS in Computer Science and Data Science from UW-Madison (Spring 2025).

What projects has he worked on in roboti: [github.com/WisconsinRobotics/WRoverSoftware] He contributed to the WRoverSoftware project at UW-Madison, focusing on rover software development using ROS2.
What are his data science projects?: [arendesai.com/datascience] Notable projects include MarketSimOptimizer (MISO market simulation) and LMP Forecasting (LEAR & DNN price models).
